message_template.content: Write a extremely short description for {key} {tone}. Focus on specific details, and avoid only describing the atmosphere or emotions. Give your answer directly.

tone: using a variety of sentence structures
key: a close-up portrait of a real human woman with unique jewelry
a group of three animated characters in vibrant outfits
a single piece of vintage furniture on a wooden floor
a scenic mountain landscape with a river in the foreground
a close-up of a hand holding a small glass bottle
a shelf filled with neatly arranged colorful books
a close-up face of an anime character with glowing eyes
two real people smiling in front of a neon-lit background
a minimalist photo of a single chair in a white room
a traditional Japanese street under soft lighting
a detailed shot of mechanical watch parts on a table
a real man wearing a hat, with intense eye contact
a fantasy anime couple with magical elements in the air
an aerial view of a rural village surrounded by fields
a flat lay of kitchen tools arranged neatly on a table
a highly expressive anime face with exaggerated features
a person partially hidden behind a curtain, backlit
a group of animated children playing under cherry blossoms
a single flower in extreme macro showing petal texture
a table with various everyday objects randomly scattered
a close-up of an elderly man's wrinkled hands holding a cane
a teenager standing beside a graffiti wall in urban daylight
an anime girl with long silver hair and mechanical wings
a cluster of kitchen spices in small glass jars on a shelf
a wide-angle view of a desert with cracked earth and bones
two animated boys wearing school uniforms under a sakura tree
a black cat sitting on a windowsill during sunset
a steampunk-inspired real woman wearing goggles and leather
a group of real people dancing at a colorful festival
a single rusty bicycle leaning against an old brick wall
a realistic 3D rendering of fruits cut in half on a plate
an anime warrior mid-attack with intense motion blur
a dense forest scene with mist and glowing mushrooms
a robotic hand reaching toward the sky in a sci-fi setting
a toddler wearing a raincoat jumping into a puddle
a collection of worn-out shoes lined up by a doorway
a man's silhouette against a bright cityscape at night
a close-up shot of a cup of coffee with latte art
an anime character crying in the rain with dramatic lighting
a real elderly couple walking hand-in-hand through a park
